mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar( cal_writer, cal_type, cal_target_type, cal_title, cal_content, cal_start_date, cal_end_date, cal_create_date, cal_update_date ) VALUES( #{calWriter}, #{calType}, #{calTargetType}, #{calTitle}, #{calContent}, #{calStartDate}, #{calEndDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT cal_num AS id, cal_title AS title, cal_start_date AS start, cal_end_date AS end, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' AND (cal_title LIKE '%연차%' OR cal_title LIKE '%반차%') THEN 'yellow' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'blue' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'orange' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'green' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'pink' ELSE NULL END AS color, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' AND (cal_title LIKE '%연차%' OR cal_title LIKE '%반차%') THEN 'black' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'black' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'black' ELSE NULL END AS textColor FROM calendar WHERE cal_target_type IN (#{empCode}, #{teamCode}, 10, 900);

SELECT cal_num id, cal_title title, cal_start_date start, cal_end_date end, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' AND (cal_title LIKE '%연차%' OR cal_title LIKE '%반차%') THEN 'yellow' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'blue' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'orange' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'green' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'pink' ELSE NULL END AS color, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' AND (cal_title LIKE '%연차%' OR cal_title LIKE '%반차%') THEN 'black' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'black' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'black' ELSE NULL END AS textColor FROM calendar WHERE cal_target_type = #{empCode}

SELECT cal_num id, cal_title title, cal_start_date start, cal_end_date end, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'blue' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'orange' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'green' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'pink' ELSE NULL END AS color, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'black' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'black' ELSE NULL END AS textColor FROM calendar WHERE cal_target_type = #{teamCode}

SELECT cal_num id, cal_title title, cal_start_date start, cal_end_date end, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'blue' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'yellow' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'green' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'pink' ELSE NULL END AS color, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'black' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'black' ELSE NULL END AS textColor FROM calendar WHERE cal_target_type = 10

SELECT cal_num id, cal_title title, cal_start_date start, cal_end_date end, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'blue' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'yellow' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'green' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'pink' ELSE NULL END AS color, CASE WHEN cal_type LIKE 'p%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 't%' THEN 'black' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'c%' THEN 'white' WHEN cal_type LIKE 'a%' THEN 'black' ELSE NULL END AS textColor FROM calendar WHERE cal_target_type = 900

SELECT c.cal_num AS calNum, CONCAT(e.emp_kor_name, ' ', CASE e.rank_code WHEN 1 THEN '대표이사' WHEN 2 THEN '부장' WHEN 3 THEN '팀장' WHEN 4 THEN '대리' WHEN 5 THEN '사원' END ) AS calWriter, c.cal_type AS calType, c.cal_target_type AS calTargetType, c.cal_title AS calTitle, c.cal_content AS calContent, c.cal_start_date AS calStartDate, c.cal_end_date AS calEndDate, c.cal_create_date AS calCreateDate, c.cal_update_date AS calUpdateDate FROM calendar c JOIN emp e ON c.cal_writer = e.emp_code WHERE c.cal_num = ${calNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar SET cal_type = #{calType}, cal_target_type = #{calTargetType}, cal_title = #{calTitle}, cal_content = #{calContent}, cal_start_date = #{calStartDate}, cal_end_date = #{calEndDate}, cal_update_date = NOW() WHERE cal_num = ${calNum}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT cal_type calType, CASE cal_type WHEN 'personal' THEN '개인일정' WHEN 'team' THEN '팀 일정' WHEN 'company' THEN '전사일정' WHEN 'artist' THEN '아티스트 일정' END AS calTypeName FROM calendar ORDER BY calTypeName
SELECT team_code teamCode, CASE WHEN team_code = 10 THEN '전사' ELSE team_name END AS teamName FROM team WHERE team_name NOT LIKE '%부' ORDER BY teamCode
